Name: Amaretto Sour (by Jeffrey Morgenthaler)
Ingredients: 5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherries .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: As the name suggests, this cocktail is dominated by amaretto, with lemon juice providing the sour balancing element and a slug of bourbon giving backbone.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2012 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler in Oregon, USA. Jeffrey's original formula calls for 45ml (1½oz) Amaretto 22.5ml (¾oz) Cask-strength bourbon 30ml (1oz) Lemon juice 5ml (1 spoon) Sugar syrup (2:1) 15ml (½oz) Egg white
Nutrition: One serving of Amaretto Sour (by Jeffrey Morgenthaler) contains 267 calories
